scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:portal" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:portal && npm run build:admin
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/api-nest && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/api-nest && npx prisma db seed
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/api-nest && npm install && cd ../portal && npm install && cd ../admin-next && npm install
